Chat GUI Documentation¶

NAME
gui - Graphic User Interface
DESCRIPTION
gui is a collection of frames and dialogs based on wxPython library for interaction with user
PACKAGE CONTENTS

chatview

connectiondlg

errordlg

logindlg

createnewdlg

settingsdlg

chatview¶

Exports class Chatview

class chatview.ChatView(parent, title)[source]¶

Main Frame that contains text controls for display chat and for add message to chat. Also it contains listbox where are all online users.

InitUI()[source]¶

Create all controls to a frame. Add binds to catch events

OnClose(event)[source]¶

Called when user close the frame.

Send quit message to server and destoy self.

OnListBoxClick(event)[source]¶

Called when user clicks on nickname in listbox.

Add nickname to textbox to send direct message.

OnSend(event)[source]¶

Called when user pushes Send button. If message isn’t empty call send_msg method of protocol and clear text control.

OnServiceChatView(sender, text)[source]¶

Called when server reports about service message.

Add sender name and service message to view text control.

atributes:

sender – nickname of person who made action

text – message itself

OnSettings(event)[source]¶

Called when user pushes Settings button.

Create SettingsDlg from settingsdlg.

OnUpdateChatView(sender, destination, text)[source]¶

Called when server reports about adding new message to chat.

Add time, sender name, destination name (if necessary) to view text control.

atributes:

sender – nickname of person who send message

destination – nickname of person which should received message or ‘*’ if it’s broadcast message

text – message itself

OnUpdateContactList(names)[source]¶

Called when server reports about changings in list of online users Update dictionary of online users and set random colors to new users.

atributes:
names – list of online users

createnewdlg¶

class createnewdlg.CreateNewDlgView(parent, id, title)[source]¶

Create dialog frame to get information for new user.

OnCreate(event)[source]¶

Called when user pushes Create bitton.

If passwords didn’t match create error_dlg from errdlg. Call signin method of protocol.

connectiondlg¶

class connectiondlg.ConnectionDlgView(parent, id, title, client_factory)[source]¶

Dialog for getting host and port for connection with server.

OnClose(event)[source]¶

Calls when user tyr close the frame. Quit program.

OnConnect(event)[source]¶

Called when user pushes Connect button.

Call reactor.ConnectTCP to connect with host and port inputed in text controls

settingsdlg¶

class settingsdlg.SettingsDlg(parent, id, title)[source]¶

Dialog for getting new nickname.

OnChange(event)[source]¶

Called when user pushes Change button.

Call chang_nick method of protocol.

errordlg¶

errordlg.error_dlg(text)[source]¶

Create and show message dialog with text.

atributes:
text - Error message

logindlg¶

class logindlg.LoginDlgView(parent, id, title)[source]¶

Dialog for getting nickname and password for authorization on server.

OnLogin(event)[source]¶

Called when user pushes Login button. Call login method of protocol.

OnNewUser(event)[source]¶

Called when user pushes Create new button. Create CreateNewDlgView from createnewdlgview.
